data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
data.quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

data.author: Audrey Hepburn
data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

data.author: Allen Saunders
data.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read

data.author: Dr. Seuss
data.quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
